sentences.sContent: It could be a cleaning business, a hairdresser’s, a consultancy or an investment bank.
sentences.sContent_eng: It could be a cleaning business, a hairdresser’s, a consultancy or an investment bank.
sentences.sCn: 它可能是一份清洁事业，成为理发师和顾问，或者成立一家投资银行。

sentences.sContent: Just like the hairdresser he plays in the film, in reality Wang can only sing as a hobby.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just like the hairdresser he plays in the film, in reality Wang can only sing as a hobby.
sentences.sCn: 就像片中他扮演的理发师一样，在现实生活中王太利只能把唱歌作为一种爱好。

trans.tranOther: a person who cuts, washes, and arranges people’s hair in particular styles
